name: 2 Hour Project Week 1 - 80's Goblin Attack
description:
Hi there, I'm Dan. This is the first in a hopefully weekly series of two hour games where I, you guessed it, make a game in two hours. Or at least as close to a game as possible.

--THIS WEEK--

I was given:

Little Men and Fish - @Sasha_Harvey

Goblins - @emmaahume

Twin-stick Shooter - @Icid0

Tile/Grid based movement - @antlerdads

80s Theme and Rollerskates -  @YuuuPatsu

Snakes - @bbkate98

Explosions/funky gore - Discord

Story:

You are Mr 80's, fresh out of the 80's. You just wanna hang out in your grid but can't because there are a bunch of goblins fused with animals trying to ruin your fun. Throw shades at them so they can appreciate a better way of life. A vapor way-ve of life.

Controls: 

WASD - Movement

Directional Keys - Rotation

Space - Throw glasses

Game:

Things only move when you do. Try to time your glasses to hit enemies.  Rotating is free. Skates make you move further. I really don't know if that's a hindrance or not.

Thanks for checking out my wak shit.
